name: Quick Shrimp Quesadillas
author: Jules921
summary: A delicious quick recipe for shrimp quesadillas. Serve with sour cream, guacamole, and salsa.
ingredients: 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp - peeled, deveined, and cut in half
directions: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add bell pepper, scallions, cumin, and chipotle powder
Cook, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender, about 3 minutes
Add shrimp and stir frequently until bright pink on the outside and the meat is opaque, 4 to 5 minutes
Add Monterey Jack cheese, reduce heat to medium, and stir until cheese is melted and mixed in with shrimp and vegetables
Place 1/5 of the filling mixture onto half of one tortilla
Fold empty side over the filling and press firmly to form a half circle
Repeat with remaining tortillas and filling
Brush both sides of tortillas with remaining olive oil
Place tortillas in a large skillet over medium-high heat and cook until crisp and golden, 3 to 5 minutes per side
